title: Praktisk info med Jon Almaas â€“ julespesial
overview: This year, Jon Almaas gives you all the practical tips you need for Christmas, and more. And not only that; you get the tips early enough that you manage to arrange everything in good time before Christmas. Then you can lower your shoulders and enter the busiest holiday season of the year, with a resting heart rate, heart rate and almost normal blood pressure.
